item.description:
Paddle Squanacook River in Townsend, MA

Sunday September 20, launch at 10:00 am

Reminder that PFDs are required.

Directions-

From the junction of routes 13 and 119 in Townsend, go east on Route 119 for 3.0 miles, and turn right onto Townsend road. Access is 2.5 miles from Route 119 at the West Groton Water Supply District plant on the right. Turn in by the yellow fire hydrant, just before the Water District building.

From route 225 in West Groton, go north for 1.1 miles on Townsend Road to the access on the left.
Entrance is just past the Water building and looks like a driveway. There is a yellow fire hydrant but all the hydrants on the road are yellow!
item.name: Squanacook River, Townsend, MA
